# mbuf_setnext

**Function**

## Declaration

```swift
errno_t mbuf_setnext(mbuf_t mbuf, mbuf_t next);
```

## Parameters

- **mbuf**: The mbuf.
- **next**: The new next mbuf.

## Return Value

0 upon success otherwise the errno error.

## Discussion

Sets the next mbuf in the chain.
title: mbuf_setnext
